title: Execution of the HACCP Plan on the Plant Floor
description: Requirements for HACCP plan implementation including worker training, CCP operator competency, monitoring compliance, record-keeping, corrective action execution, and verification of plan effectiveness

requirements.question: Is there documented evidence that all plant workers have attended a HACCP training, including specific training for CCP operators?
Do CCP operators understand basic HACCP principles and their role in monitoring CCPs?
Are the CCP monitoring activities and frequencies in conformance with the HACCP Plan and CCP SOPs?
Are CCP monitoring records signed off (or initialed) by the operator(s) who are carrying out and recording the CCP check?
Are the CCP records reviewed and signed off by the food safety supervisor and/or management (second signatory)?
Is there a deviation record detailing documented corrective actions when a deviation/loss of control of a CCP occurs (a critical control limit is exceeded)?
